import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I'm a passionate UX/UI designer with a focus on creating meaningful digital experiences. My approach combines user-centered design principles with creative problem-solving to deliver solutions that not only look great but also provide real value to users.

With experience in both design and development, I understand the full spectrum of the design process from initial research and ideation to final implementation and testing.

Skills & Tools

Design

  • User Research
  • Wireframing
  • Prototyping
  • Visual Design

Tools

  • Figma
  • Adobe Creative Suite
  • Sketch
  • Principle

Development

  • HTML/CSS
  • JavaScript
  • React
  • Responsive Design
); }; export default About;
